miaTime: Microbiome Time Series Analysis

Leo Lahti

leo.lahti@iki.fi

Yagmur Simsek

yagmur.simsek@hsrw.org

2024-08-27

Source: vignettes/miaTime.Rmd
miaTime.Rmd

Introduction

miaTime implements tools for time series manipulation based on the TreeSummarizedExperiment data container.

Installation

Installing the latest development version in R.

library(devtools)
devtools::install_github("microbiome/miaTime")

Loading the package:

library(miaTime)

See articles for more detailed example workflows.
